personal_info.name: LE HOANG VU
personal_info.location: Dich Vong Hau, Cau Giay, Ha Noi
objective: Seeking an AI internship position to enhance personal proficiency and learn a business aspects of running a software in a company

description: Developed an AI-powered automated stock trading bot
Collecting stock market data from major exchanges

projects.name: Anomaly Detection in Complex Indoor Surveillance
projects.description: A system to detect anomaly in complex environments.
main_tasks: Developed a branch to detect actions from people within video by fine-tuning ActionCLIP
Improved performance of YOLO and DeepSORT to detect and track people
Used Milvus to store the vector embeddings serving later for detecting abnormal actions

projects.name: Super Resolution With Pytorch
projects.description: The implementation of SRRESNET and SRGAN in super resolution task for blurry images.
main_tasks: Designed and optimized deep learning models to enhance image quality
Preprocessed datasets and trained models using PyTorch
Evaluated model performance using PSNR and SSIM metrics

projects.name: Image Retrieval
projects.description: An app to retrieve similar images from the given image and text from users
main_tasks: Used pretrained models to store vector embeddings from images into Milvus Vector Database
Designed a prompt for LLM to rerank visual images into a valid list to display on the app

awards: Student Achievement Awards Summer 2023 | Excellent Student
Top 10 National High School Exam for A01 Group 2021-2022
First Prize in the Provincial Mathematics Excellent Student Competition | 12th grade of high school
